` - export const mapFileList = (fileTree: FileTree) => { - const li = document.createElement('li') - // 隐藏打开的根文件夹 - li.setAttribute('style', `--i: ${fileTree.level}`) - const fileName = `${fileTree.fileName}` - const input = document.createElement('input') - if (fileTree.level === 0) li.style.display = 'none' - if (!fileTree.isDir) { - li.innerHTML = fileName - li.classList.add('file-item') - li.appendChild(input) - li.addEventListener('click',(e)=>{ - e.stopPropagation() - window.api.sendToMain(OPEN_FILE,fileTree.path) - li.classList.toggle('show-input') - input.focus() - }) - return li - } else { - li.innerHTML = triangleDown + fileName - li.classList.add('dir') - const ul = document.createElement('ul') - ul.addEventListener('click',e=>{ - e.stopPropagation() - ul.classList.toggle('close') - }) - ul.appendChild(li) - fileTree.children.forEach((file) => { - ul.appendChild(mapFileList(file)) - }) - return ul \ No newline at end of file - } - } + const li = document.createElement('li') + // 隐藏打开的根文件夹 + li.setAttribute('style', `--i: ${fileTree.level}`) + const fileName = `${fileTree.fileName}` + const input = document.createElement('input') + if (fileTree.level === 0) li.style.display = 'none' + if (!fileTree.isDir) { + li.innerHTML = fileName + li.classList.add('file-item') + li.appendChild(input) + li.addEventListener('click', (e) => { + e.stopPropagation() + window.api.sendToMain(OPEN_FILE, fileTree.path) + // li.classList.toggle('show-input') + // input.focus() + }) + return li + } else { + li.innerHTML = triangleDown + fileName + li.classList.add('dir') + const ul = document.createElement('ul') + ul.addEventListener('click', (e) => { + e.stopPropagation() + ul.classList.toggle('close') + }) + ul.appendChild(li) + fileTree.children.forEach((file) => { + ul.appendChild(mapFileList(file)) + }) + return ul + } +}
